evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: seeking a declaratory judgment and injunction and, on an emergency basis, a temporary restraining order

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Declare that the President’s termination of Plaintiff Hampton Dellinger was unlawful, and that Plaintiff Hampton Dellinger is the Special Counsel and head of the Office of Special Counsel;

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: seeking a declaratory judgment and injunction and, on an emergency basis, a temporary restraining order

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Order that Plaintiff Hampton Dellinger may not be removed from his office as Special Counsel or in any way be treated as having been removed, denied or obstructed in accessing the benefits and resources of his office, or otherwise be obstructed from his ability to carry out his duties;

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Order that Defendants Bessent, Gor, Kammann, and Vought may not place an Acting Special Counsel in Plaintiff Hampton Dellinger’s position, or otherwise recognize any other person as Special Counsel or as the agency head of the Office of Special Counsel;

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: seeking a declaratory judgment and injunction and, on an emergency basis, a temporary restraining order

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Equitable relief for statutory and constitutional violations

extracted.value: Equitable relief (to prevent and restrain ongoing violations)

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Order Defendants Bessent, Gor, Gorman, Kammann, and Vought to pay Plaintiff Hampton Dellinger all wages and benefits owed to him as Special Counsel of the Office of Special Counsel;
